name: Black, Gold and Aubergine Shawl
description:
This magnificent handwoven piece measures 28" wide x 88"long. 

It is made of hand dyed yarns, 100% silk 

This pattern is woven in in a simple weave  shot through with details of texture and colour.

Care instructions: hand wash, hang to dry, steam press or dry clean. 

Colours vary depending on your monitor's settings. This scarf has black and golds with hints of blue and aubergine.
Please review our shop policies on our website before placing your order.

This piece is available only for the month of  December.

Made by Diana Sanderson in Vancouver, Canada.

name: 'Jacaranda' Textured Scarf
description:
This pretty scarf measures 8 1/2" wide x 80" long (including fringe). it is light weight and longer than many of our designs.

This scarf was handwoven and hand dyed using 90% silk yarn and 10% linen and merino wool. The colours are delicate and are reminiscent of the jacaranda tree when it first blooms in spring. 

Care instructions: hand wash, hang to dry, steam press or dry clean. 

Colours may vary depending on your monitor's settings. This scarf has a variety of colours including violet and fresh greens.
